website_summaries.verdict: Small but versatile, this machine can handle fairly detailed cutting projects, but it can be tough to set the blades at the correct height.
pros: Cuts out custom designs, preset designs, and stencils very well
Included software integrates well and is simple to use
Works well for smaller sized projects
Doesn’t take up too much space on the crafting table
cons: Somewhat noisy, about the level and pitch of a fax machine
Installation and use instructions are not very detailed
Setting up cutting blade at the right height can be dicey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many die cut machines and I finally bought this one. Only because of the size, outlook and software. Before I place the order, I'm not realize that the software is so so important when cutting. The silhouette studio surprised me. It is very user friendly and very powerful. I was assume that I have to open AI or Photoshop to pre process my art work. but after I know how does the studio works. I never have to do so. I cut a golden banner for the Lunar New Year. So easy and so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Karby

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super user friendly, has multiple setting for different cuts. Software it came with is also easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Unbiased Review Guy

customer_reviews.title: The cut would not align properly and I wasted a lot of materials because of it
customer_reviews.text: This product gave me a lot of problems. The cut would not align properly and I wasted a lot of materials because of it. I contacted customer service about my problem and was greeted with the worst customer service that I had ever experience. They gave me the typical run-around telling me to re install the software and reset the device, which is a load of bull. My portrait was under warranty and so I told them to just repair my machine or refund me. They did neither. I hope whoever reads then review to look for another product. I got rid of my portrait and decided to go with ZING KNK and never looked back.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for applique
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It will save me time cutting out my applique shapes, once I learn all the little tricks. The learning curve was longer than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So flipping happy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had both Silhouette and Cricut! The Cricut was extremely difficult for me to understand. Plus it was online software which lagged like crazy. Returned it and bought Silhouette. This thing was like a dream compared. If you’re looking into a cutting machine Silhouette is definitely the way to go
customer_reviews.author: SioSqu

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my craft business
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the machine. I use to be a vinyl flex supervisor at a large company running an industrial grade machine like this. This does everything that one did, but on a smaller scale. Absolutely love it. When I retired I never thought I would be able to afford and operate a craft business involving these mediums, but here I am with this. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Silhouette Portrait 2-learning curve, but good machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Portrait machine. The first one still works well, but Microsoft's latest Windows 10 update doesn't play nicely with the original Silhouette Portrait. Silhouette America has come a long way since I bought my original Portrait in terms of providing set-up instructions and some tutorials about using the Silhouette with updated software. If you are not aware of some of the basic concepts used in electronic/digital cutting machines, though, it can be extremely confusing. Silhouette America was wise to bring on Kelly to write better instructions and produce video tutorials for them. All that being said, the machine itself is very good. I use it mostly for print and cut and creating embellishments for hand-made cards.
customer_reviews.author: JDMT

customer_reviews.title: A bit of a learning curve
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can print and cut stickers for my planner. There was a bit of a learning curve, and I'm still figuring out the blade settings. However, the instruction manual PDFs that Silhouette gives you when you set it up on your computer give pretty in depth explanations of how to do everything. I'm glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating between this and the new silhouette cameo 4. I went with this as a more reasonably priced option just to make sure I could actually figure it out. I intended to buy the cameo 4 in the future if I liked the portrait. I’m not now. I love love love the portrait and have literally no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: krystal Kinney

customer_reviews.title: BEST
customer_reviews.text: I bought Portrait 1 used to see if I liked Silhouette and I did! but I was dumb and bought a Cricut during the black friday sale. It was bad. SO BAD. it was a HASSLE to return and they almost wouldn't take it back. After that I bought the Portrait 2 right here and fell in LOVE. You still have to have a bright light over it to get it to register but it's everything I could want for sticker making!! (Beware Cricuts btw they just ain't as user friendly)
customer_reviews.author: Brockus

customer_reviews.title: Great for paper flowers
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I make paper flowers, but I have made other things, too. This size is large enough to make many types of things. Some sgv files are sold saying you have to use a 12 inch cutter, but all you have to do is ungroup and rearrange the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kime

customer_reviews.title: Nice machine, but tricky to use
customer_reviews.text: I used to work (hobby) with silk printing tshirt, and graphic design, and it took me so much time to use the machine. It includes a cd software, but my laptop do not have cd drive, so I have to search online for installation. I am just saying that is a great product, but need patience to learn how to installed and used.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge de Leon

customer_reviews.title: Simple and durable printer
customer_reviews.text: Simple and durable printer. The learning curve is not very steep with the cutting program and this printer makes great cuts for thin materials.
customer_reviews.author: Rohr 3D Solutions LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great I make some awesome clothes, stickers, magnets, keychains,and various craft projects. Shillouette is a community. If you don't know how to use look on YouTube it's tons of videos. This machine has changed my life turn on my crafty side and I'm maximizing. Off things I have learned you can to!
customer_reviews.author: Ramellosugahill

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, but get the bigger one.
customer_reviews.text: The software is amazing, you can design and cut just about anything. Unfortunately, it's a pain to try and find the right size vinyl and other materials to cut. I ended up buying the bigger version shortly after because I hated having to cut the vinyl to size and then piecing scraps together to avoid excessive waste. This machine and it's software are so great, you should just go ahead and buy the bigger one from the get go, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle K.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this machine for a while now and absolutely love it. When it arrived, it was well packaged and was not damaged at all. The set up was pretty easy because there are videos and tutorials on their website or on the internet that can help you with getting it up and working. I have cut card stock, sticker paper and even very thin magnet paper. When I used the magnet paper I needed to use another blade and tape it to the mat. Perfect squares. I can print stickers for almost anything and the machine is precise in the cutting. There are so many features that I still have not tried but excited to.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I love everything I've learned to do so far with this machine. The silhouette software is easy to learn along with helpful tutorials I've found online. Replacement items are very affordable. Additional accessories also don't cost nearly as much as I thought. Very pleased with it. It runs a little noisy but it isn't a big deal
customer_reviews.author: AmberRae

customer_reviews.title: Noobie Go To
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine to get your feet wet! Silhouette is slightly more complicated than the other brands, but I really liked the ability to get in there and really customize my project!
customer_reviews.author: K8isGr8

customer_reviews.title: Wish i could give negative starts
customer_reviews.text: Item does not work. Unfortunately i was not able to return as its past 30 days...couldn't use it before as it was a present for my pregnant wife who then gave birth in early January. Manufacturer has not offered any solutions to the problem. Machine does not cut ( mind you this is the primary role of this machine)! Now im stuck with a nonworking piece of junk that cost over $150 Do not recommend!! Cricut is probably a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Silhouette is a GREAT product. It was hard to decide between the ...
customer_reviews.text: The Silhouette is a GREAT product. It was hard to decide between the Cameo & Portrait, but ultimately I decided the size would be fine. I couldn't think of anything in which I would need to cut 12 inches across. and what things I could think of, I could easily switch around and print length-wise. I've learned so much using this machine, from cutting vinyl and making car decals, to making my own cards and stickers! It takes trial and error, but I'm so happy with this purchase. Once you can figure out the basics, you are ready to cut just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Broken blade
customer_reviews.text: I had high Hope's for this machine. I was wondering why all my vinal was getting ruined. Straight out of the box and the blade was broken and stuck on cardstock. I have returned the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: For what I've used it for, it's been great. The downside is the size of the cutting area. I've needed to cut a 12x12 image and couldn't. The mat has lasted a while. The blade that comes standard does a very good job. However, if cutting small intricate designs it sometimes bunches up the vinyl. Other times I have to double cut to get the vinyl fully detachable from the backing. The silhouette design store is okay. I wish they were more affordable on commercial prices. The software is very good though. It takes a little practice to get it right. All in all, it's a great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cody H.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product for small projects.
customer_reviews.text: Very good at cutting stencils but I had issues with some of the designs that I tried to create and I don't know if it was the fault of the machine or if it was the material I was using. Example: I was trying to cut out some words and sometimes the stencils would stick to the blade (even after cleaning it). Overall, I am pleased with the software that came with it (flexible design capabilities) and it is pretty much the perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Novak

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only 1 year before it broke. When it did work it was great. Bummed I paid so much for something that didn't last over a year.
customer_reviews.author: E Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for casual crafters.
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect combination of function and price for my occasional crafting needs. I tend to go in spurts. I have used the Portrait both for cutting stencils for glass etching and painting, as well as the drawing function with the silhouette markers. Small footprint and easy to use intuitive design program. Stores easily until my next project!
customer_reviews.author: Kimber

customer_reviews.title: Headache some days, tree killer and worth it
customer_reviews.text: Software is easy to install. Quick and black now when it comes to actually cutting or getting down to business you need to join Facebook groups or call silhouette America and when I called the first few times, it took fooorever to get a hold of someone. If no one answers you get hung up on and this, took forever. So keep that in mid and you can youtube what you need done like I did. The blade is cutting outside the lines and not sure why but calibrating was harder than it should've been and still the problem was not fixed :/ but it's worth the money to invest in leaving how to use the machine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a cricut and the only complaint was the amount of money you spend on buy cartridges and this you do not have to do. You just download your images onto your computer and your computer works with the portrait. I only have one complaint that from time to time my portriat will cut all over the place and not my image but that happens once in a blue moon. I love it and have done alot of work with mine...loved it so well, also got the cameo. Same problem about cutting all over the place but all in all that only happens every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: bebex1980

customer_reviews.title: No instructions hard to figure out
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with better instructions on how to use this system definitely went through a lot of paper trying to figure out how to use system
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Loving my silhouette portrait 2!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving my cutter and I appreciate the auto adjustment feature for the blade with the various materials.
customer_reviews.author: Aviance Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service & a Nice Little Machine
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this little machine. I wanted a cutting machine, but I didn't want to spend a lot on it. This is working out perfectly. And Silhouette's customer service is great. I just emailed their support line because the cap on my blade broke, and I got a message back within 10 minutes. 10 minutes! That's impressive. And they're going to send me a new one, so yay. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine for small jobs. Works well with my Silhouette Studio program.
customer_reviews.author: tammdesigns

customer_reviews.title: The little machine that could!
customer_reviews.text: I hand make a lot of signs for my work and have only used a manual version of this at a craft store. Huge pain in the rear. I would spend hours of my own time there making the signs. I should have purchased this a lot sooner. Very neat machine. I haven't even began to get all the way into what it is capable of doing yet. I was a little intimidated by the set up but there are a few Youtube videos online that are very helpful. It also comes with an instructional video that is easier to understand than trying to read the directions. For the price this is a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty stinking cool
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to really dive in, I have only printed lettering for my business but it works great! The set up was easy and the program you DL is pretty freaking cool
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Ahmann

customer_reviews.title: 😖
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time getting replaced for this vinyl cutter and I have the same problems with it. It won’t cut the vinyl so at this point I have to buy a different one
customer_reviews.author: debora

customer_reviews.title: Great fun that works seriously hard.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore my Portrait! I can cat nearly anything on it. I've made everything from 3D paper roses to cards. The list of things you can do with a Portrait is endless. I can print and cut out magnets for a function my daughter is hostessing. I can create original designs, or use ones from The Silhouette design store. Creating my own isn't difficult either. The rotate tool is great ! There are software updates coming in August to make it even more useful from a phone or tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Caterinka P.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product !
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have had the proper chance to use the portrait, I can confidently say that is addicting and a lot of fun! You can custom cut stickers, vinyl for sublimating and much more! Now that I’ve had time to use this machine I’d only wish I had upgraded to the larger size Cameo model!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I've been using mine like crazy! Was to learn and you can make some great stuff with it
customer_reviews.author: EVFPOPART

customer_reviews.title: Great for all types of crafts!
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight learning curve just like for any new craft machine. However, I am loving the versatility. I bought this instead of the larger, more expensive machine since I wasnt sure how much I would use it. But am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, but if you are trying to cut shrink paper... it won't work... I've tried with the deep cut blade as well and ran it more than 5 times, it just won't cut through. It works great for stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Didnt work from day one, waste of money. Customer service sucks for the company. They act like you're stupid and can't see in a video that the autoblade isn't working properly. Box accidentally got thrown out so I can't return it now
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Schultz

customer_reviews.title: noise
customer_reviews.text: I thought this machine would make less noise than the first Portrait, but I think is even worse. Other than that I love my new Portrait.
customer_reviews.author: M. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Pack - Muhnty🤘🏽
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the machine doesn’t cooperate because it won’t cut within the lines I set, but it’s rare. This is a awesome machine to start off with. I made a few coins so far off of my clothing thanks to this gadget. - Muhnty IG: Muhnty🤘🏽
customer_reviews.author: michelle betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome paper crafting tool!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a Slice die-cutting machine and after having my portrait for a few weeks I can say this is far and away a more useful tool. I have had so much fun using the design center and the free $10 gift card is plenty to get you off to a good start considering all of the designs you can find for $ 0.99 or less. Set up and use are pretty intuitive although I did heed the warnings of others regarding blade settings (and I use the test cut function every time just to be safe.) Fir the price I really can not recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: REkind

customer_reviews.title: The quality is perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, unfortunately, deliver was irresponsible, this was left out side my building open to the public eye it was never give it to me in my hand they just ring the bell and left it out very inappropriate delivery
customer_reviews.author: Evelina Markland

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the Silhouette portrait 2! Easy to learn and set up and it cuts amazing!! Definitely recommended. I use mine to cut vinyl for many different items!
customer_reviews.author: Jamielynn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my uncle, I haven’t heard him say anything about it, so it must have worked fine for his wife
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gevedon

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra $75 and get the circuit
customer_reviews.text: The blade isn't sharp at all, I had to run things through the cutter 3-4 times and it still wouldn't cut and it's really loud. Spend the extra $75 and get a better cutter
customer_reviews.author: Robert Strait

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl cutter
customer_reviews.text: first using this model and i love super easy to use and for good price... if anyone has question i can help... i love this vinyl cutter... it super nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with my silhouette portrait
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my silhouette portrait. I do a lot of different craft project and one of the most tedious aspects has been cutting out shapes, my attention to detail and wanting sharp crisp lines hasn't helped either. I purchased my portrait and played around with it and was pleased by how quickly I got started with it. Within a couple weeks of purchasing it I was putting it to the test by helping a friend with a baby shower. The machine performed great! It continues to be one of the best craft things I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Was missing the blade but amazon fixed problem love this
customer_reviews.author: Nicole b.

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great!
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, I'm glad I chose this instead of the cameo. It often eats the paper wrong and the cut settings are totally wrong, I used the suggested setting which was a fail! If I wanted to see an outline it would have been perfect and this was with a brand new blade through silhouette vinyl
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I can make stickers now!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I love this thing! For the longest time I've wanted to make my own stickers and I bought this thing and now I CAN! The Portrait does more than make stickers but, I mainly use it for that. Once you figure out how to use the machine and set the blade, it's very easy to use consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Bo Peep

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty neat. I have been printing out every decal I can think of and have even started dabbling with the markers and temporary tattoos. The options are great!
customer_reviews.author: occasionallyenjoyable

customer_reviews.title: great for personal/general use
customer_reviews.text: if you are just looking to make simple designs, then this product is perfect. but if you are wanting to customize your own graphics...get better software. it does have a few hick ups with detailed designs. and the software is not the best. but for the money...i love it. youtube helps more then the video instructions do. and i would recommend always buying 9 inch rolls of vinyl. a lot easier then using the cut board it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Gimmy

customer_reviews.title: just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.text: i love having an updated silhouette machine (mine was well over 6 years old and completely crashed on me). it's still the basic model but it does what i need and it does it well (cuts card stock and vinyl). i'm looking forward to trying it with some fabric! the mat is extra sticky and i ripped quite a bit of card stock but i just stuck it to the carpet a few times to fill it with fibers and that seems to have helped!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Dunkin

customer_reviews.title: Silhouette is great for craft projects
customer_reviews.text: The Silhouette Portrait is a great economical cutter for crafters. I like the ease of set-up and there are multiple videos online to help out new users. I'm using this for clay projects and it's really going to save me all the time I used to spend on hand transferring patterns/drawings that are repetitive.
customer_reviews.author: mel340

customer_reviews.title: Excellent die cutter that easily cuts intricate designs and can cut multiple media.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent die cutting machine. Easy to work and cuts very intricate designs cleanly. Easily cuts multiple medias. Portable, so you can take it with you to other sites. No annual fee and unlike the new Cricut machine, you do not need to be connected to the internet to use it. All the designs are yours to keep when you download them and are not "rented" as with another die cutter.
customer_reviews.author: KMiller

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Bought to make gifts and it's great. Super easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for crafting/cutting
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. I had no trouble setting it up. The cutting is great. I can't wait to do a lot of crafting with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lakendria

customer_reviews.title: Who knew
customer_reviews.text: I got this thing not knowing one lick of how to use it. Iit was easy to set up but the instructions were very basic. I have had to rely on Youtube tutorials to really learn the ins and outs, but there are a ton of them out there and they are often better than reading how to do something. It has now preoccupied my days for weeks and who knew I could be so creative. I have made a TON of really cute stuff. Even if you're not so talented in executing your creative ideas, like me, you can make professional looking crafts and projects very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Great Crafting Tool!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit of a learning curve to use the more advanced features, but well worth the investment. You can pull any image into the software and cut it out. Use higher quality/heavier weight paper for an acceptable cut. The basic software is probably functional enough for most users, and you don't have to buy images or artwork from th manufacturer in order to use it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little machine!
customer_reviews.text: The Portrait is very easy to set up and installing/updating Silhouette Studio was simple. My first cut of vinyl came out perfect. The ability to use your own pictures to create cut patterns makes this machine awesome! The auto-trace function makes things incredibly easy. I'm very pleased with the Silhouette Portrait.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Tricky at first, but so easy after!
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit tricky to learn the nuances of the settings for paper types and jobs, but it's an excellent addition to my equipment. I can make stickers do much faster and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Seon

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and so much fun! I was a first time Silhouetter, never used a Cricut or anything. I was able to make my first creation super easy! The only complaint is that the software doesn't work perfectly with my computer (windows 10) so I need to contact their support team. I've had so much fun making things for my house and even for my work! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Kirts

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Crafting Tool
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally bit the bullet and purchased the Silhouette Portrait. In just a couple of weeks, I've already used it several times including to make custom decorations for my son's birthday party. It was very easy to set up and fairly self explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Coggins

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. Had a little trouble keeping the mat from slipping at first, but once i pressed down on the roller bar we were off to the races.
customer_reviews.author: aggietwins03

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for the sake of my bulletin boards :)
customer_reviews.text: I use my Silhouette for making things for my classroom. I was tired of using the one font of diecut letters they have at my high school. The Silhouette has really made it quick and easy to make lots of fun fonts and signs for everything. I have done a bunch of projects so far and I love not having to hand cut everything. The software that comes with it is super simple to use. The machine itself has been running like a champ, and the cutting mat seems to be holding up quite well. The price was great compared to a lot of other machines and NO CARTRIDGES!!! I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nclindsey

customer_reviews.title: Silhouette Portrait
customer_reviews.text: I just LOVE my Silhouette Portrait! There are no cartridges to buy like the Cricut. You just buy the ones you want and most are 99 cents or less and you have them forever to use over and over. I chose the Portrait over the Cameo because the Portrait is smaller and I have limited space to operate it.
customer_reviews.author: Martha R.

customer_reviews.title: work great, used for vinyl
customer_reviews.text: work great, used for vinyl, lots of youtube videos to answer questions, pretty amazing
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and learn how to use! I love being able to make my own shirts and stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely bad product. It worked for the first 10-20 cuts after an extremely steep learning curve and then failed after that. Absolutely no reason why, after having updated the software and using the Silhouette app. Extremely expensive waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: neoncrown

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite toy of allllll time! How did I live with out this. It's compact and is my first cutting machine. The silhouette studio program was easy to learn and the portrait cuts beautifully. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Silhouette Portrait
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this new cutter. I have done a lot of cutting since my recent purchase and have no complaints. Still learning to use it. Have gone on the website and downloaded the tutorial instructions with pictures- real easy to understand. I have bought some quite complicated cut files (eg. 3D large desk organizer) and have cut all the pieces but I am not sure how to put it together as the picture of it is quite small. Is there somewhere on the website to get instructions for assembling? I hope someone will contact me with answers or do you have a phone # to call? Thanks in advance, Joanne Austin
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Austin

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to create stencils for glass etching. It worked very well. The mat is hard to clean off which is frustrating sometimes but it works great. It is also very fun to watch if you haven't seen this before!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Robbins

customer_reviews.title: It's a mini Cameo. I love this machine.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. I love this machine. I actually downgraded from the Cameo because I needed something that took up less space. It is just like I didn't switch at all. It does everything I need it to do but in less space. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: What an investment!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a digital cutter, that wasn't dependent on cartridges, and when I got the opportunity to purchase the Portrait, I jumped at it. My friend has the Cameo, and, apart from the extra 3.5 inches of width, I have the same functionality for less. The machine is compact, and easy to fit on to my minimal computer station, and learning to use it is easy. Even my adult son has taken to using it for his technical projects. My next step is to learn to create my own templates, which shouldn't take long to master. Thank you Amazon and Silhouette. My new toy is a total hit!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Adams

customer_reviews.title: Small but geting the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far . I gave 4 star and not 5 only because i cant judges it base on 1 month of use but so far it is working good. No problems .
customer_reviews.author: Atiba

customer_reviews.title: Useful addition for any craftsperson
customer_reviews.text: Very useful product with a powerful program behind it. I also prefer the curved look to the cutter compared with others and its also more compact which is important for tight work spaces. Easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my machine so much. I have bought 2 so this is my 2nd one, both from amazon. I am happy with them both. The sky is the limit with this cutter. Makes crafting so nice.
customer_reviews.author: mike10

customer_reviews.title: Great little crafting machine
customer_reviews.text: Nice little machine, my blade kind of sucks so I have it dialed all the way up but it works fine. Looking forward to making more stuff with it!
customer_reviews.author: beanbun

customer_reviews.title: Teacher's best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've bought in years. I use it to make things for my classroom, activities for my students, labels, decals, cards, gift boxes, literally EVERYTHING. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter for it's price
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. For me is very important to cut small texts and images and this plotter cutting text letters just 4mm of height. I got what I want
customer_reviews.author: Rustam

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this machine and all that it can do. I watched tons of YouTube videos before it was delivered so that once it got here it was really simple. I read tons of reviews when deciding between this and a Cricut and I am so glad that I chose the Silhouette!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A challenge to get it to play nice with registration marks, but a fun little cutter.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for small projects
customer_reviews.text: I use the this product for my business and so far it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I have made on Amazon. Amazon had the best price for this product, by far! This is my first Silhouette product so I have been learning to use it slowly. Absolutely read directions. I have also been going to very helpful blogs that give many tips on how to do certain things.
customer_reviews.author: kland54

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: This is the most difficult machine to use. I've done everything step by step exactly as shown and it STILL doesn't cut right. I wasted $200 on this machine that is nothing but a paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my existing program!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make my business more portable. It has been amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Gibson

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly and great for a beginner too!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this machine. I'm new to using one and it was so user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am having a ball learning my new Portrait. It is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutter!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few days now and am blown away by what this thing does! I can't believe I am able to get such professional results at home. Easy to set up and use and the possibilities are literally endless...coolest thing EVER!
customer_reviews.author: shortstop88

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work like what I thought. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work well. I owned 3 silhouettes and this one I am very disappointed. I was trying to return it but it’s to late. I’m very disappointed. And I’d really like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Cold

customer_reviews.title: Excellent A+++
customer_reviews.text: its very easy to use and so do the software.
customer_reviews.author: Jalvis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine with all my heart! I was worried I might regret not going for the larger Cameo, but I haven't run into any projects thus far any project that the Portrait couldn't handle.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Horrible buy a CRICUT
customer_reviews.text: SOFTWARE IS HORRIBLE HARD TO LEARN AND OUTDATED SAVE THE HEADache get a cricut
customer_reviews.author: Joshua o

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it!! Almost bought the Cameo but glad I didn't spend the extra money for it. This little baby does everything I need it to and a whole lot more. I stay up into the wee hours of the morning inventing new things to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: BLU

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for airbrush stencils.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product and the software works better than expected. I use it to make airbrush stencils on acetate and frisket paper
customer_reviews.author: rp

customer_reviews.title: Compact and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great little machine. I’m a complete newbie but have been able to figure it out just fine. I like that it’s compact, and it was affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Silhouette Portrait
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this cutting product. I use it in my fiber art projects and I will be using it to make some cards in the near future. The cutting surface you attach the paper or other product and feed into the machine is flimsy and I'll probably have to replace it soon. It should be a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Seamans

customer_reviews.title: Happy skeptic
customer_reviews.text: I cautiously purchased this item approximately three weeks ago. The products I was able to produce were staggering. I have a strong background in Photoshop and computers, which made working with the Silhouette software a breeze. Had I realized what I could have done, I would have ordered this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fyler II

product_meta.title: Silhouette Portrait 2 Electronic Cutting Tool
feature_bullets: Silhouette Portrait 2 with Bluetooth and Autoblade
Cuts a variety of materials including: cardstock, fabric, heat transfer material, transparencies, paper, vellum, adhesive vinyland magnet paper
Mac and PC compatible software included
Note: Kindly refer user manual before use
